summary: 14-year-old Ellie Christianson wants to make her father Ben her love partner. And when her mother Karen turns up dead, Ellie has a good opportunity.
cast: Louise Myrback|Julia Stiles|Chelsea Field|William R. Moses|Vanessa Zima|Patrick Muldoon|Casey Rion|Linda Hart|Patrick McTavish|Connie Blankenship|Venessa Verdugo|Michael Parks|Kyle Sabihy|Sterling Macer Jr.|Beano|Timothy McNeil|Sandra Kinder|Candace Hilligoss|Tom Morris|Mark Fontana|Mark C. Sproull|Tom Charles Maxwell|Bron Tieman|Amaryllis Borrego|Matthew Hurley
title: Wicked
